cab.content: IHIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY*S GOVERNMENT)gjj CRET, 4455.WAR.....CABINET.MINISTRY OF HEALTH.Copy of Resolution passed by Insurance Committee for County of Somerset at Meeting on 27th April? ,1918^f,Xt was unanimously resolved that we the Somerset County Insurance Committee earnestly and strongly urge the Government to immediately press forward with the Ministry of Health Bill which we consider is urgently needed, but that the Maternity and Child Welfare Bill be postponed (in accordance with the views of Lord Rhondda and Major Astor), as the terms of the latter Bill are permissive only and not compulsory, and further we are of the opinion the powers of the Maternity ana Child Welfare Bill should be provided and co-ordinated in the Ministry of Health Bill."Whitehall Gardens, S*W. May 6th, 1918,
